markdownRemark.html:
Featuring the best in traditional and contemporary blues, from 1920 to the present. The blues is comprised of many different styles, and I don’t shy away from any of them.

Hosted by Rich “The Blues Professor” Pettit. I’ve been a volunteer and broadcaster at WRFG for more than 30 years, I invite you to e-mail me with questions or comments at drpettit@comcast.net.
